text: This is a list of Kazakh European Film Award winners and nominees. This list details the performances of Kazakh actors, actresses, and films that have either been submitted or nominated for, or have won, a European Film Award. ==Main categories== {| class="wikitable" width="100%" cellpadding="5" |- !width="5%"|Year !width="18%"|Award !width="28%"|Recipient !width="10%"|Status !width="38%"|Note |- |rowspan="2"| 2008 || People's Choice Award for Best European Film || Mongol: The Rise of Genghis Khan || || Russian-Mongol-Kazakh co-production |- | European Discovery || Tulpan || || Kazakh-German-Italian- Polish-Russian-Mongol-Swiss co-production |- | 2009 || European Discovery || The Other Bank || || Georgian-Kazakh co-production |- |} ==External links== * Nominees and winners at the European Film Academy website ==See also== * List of Kazakh submissions for the Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film Category:Cinema of Kazakhstan Category:European Film Awards Category:Lists of mass media in Kazakhstan
title: List of Kazakh European Film Award winners and nominees
